metro.GameScreen

Class GameScreen.SettingsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.SettingsWindow
  • Enclosing class:
    GameScreen

    public class GameScreen.SettingsWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the settings window, that provides some options to configure. These options are: Resolution, fullscreen, OpenGL settings, amount of segments and amount of samples.
    Author:
    hauke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameScreen.SettingsWindow()
      Creates a settings window.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addButtonObserver()
      Adds the observer for the "ok" button that closes the window.
      private void addCheckboxObserver()
      Creates the observer with sub-classes for all the check-boxes of this class.
      private void addListObserver()
      Add observer for all lists (resolution, samples and segments)
      private void close()
      Just closes the window and sets the _settingsWindow to null.
